ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: When I was lower level (5th to 15th) I realised that merchants were selling batwings, scales and bone chips for ~ 1Gp per stack (give or take my Cha, etc).
ygData.messageBody:
When I was lower level (5th to 15th) I realised that merchants were selling
batwings, scales and bone chips for ~ 1Gp per stack (give or take my Cha,
etc). Players would buy them from me for 1 to 2 Pp per stack. Can you say
HELL YES! ? I resold more components than I fought for by a factor of at
least 100. Buying and selling components can be a good way for lower level
players to make some quick cash.

> I am still new to EQ I am looking for ways to earn money. I read post
> were people half my lvl (Bard lvl 6) have all this $. I am open to
> suggestions.
